TEXT.TITLE: CONTINENTAL MEDICAL <CONT> PLANS DEBT FILING
TEXT.BODY: Continental Medical Systems Inc said it plans to file with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering about 25 mln dlrs of convertible subordinated debentures. The company said it expects to file with the SEC within the next two to three weeks. Reuter
